class.name: FastCosineTransformerTest

javadoc.text:
Test case for fast cosine transformer. *

* FCT algorithm is exact, the small tolerance number is used only to account * for round-off errors.
Returns an array containing {@code true, false} in order to check both * standard and orthogonal DCTs.
javadoc.return: an array of parameters for this parameterized test

method.name: transform
method.comment: Should never occur. This clause is a safeguard in case other types are used to TransformType (which should not be done).

javadoc.text: Test of transformer for the ad hoc data.
Test of parameters for the transformer.
Test of transformer for the sine function.
